Online Education Partners
 


Ed2Go

Ed2go was founded in 1997 to provide quality education the fastest way possible — online. What began as an email correspondent program has grown into a leading online continuing education provider, reaching life-long learners in 50 states and more than 16 countries. We believe that anyone can learn, and we exist to empower lives through education.
Earning a certificate from top colleges and universities is more accessible and affordable than ever. Through our partner network, you can gain the skills and certifications employers look for.
2,000+ Academic Institutions
80+ Corporations
100+ Workforce Agencies
Ed2go's parent company, Cengage, is an education and technology company built for learners. The company serves the higher education, K-12, professional, library and workforce training markets worldwide. Cengage creates learning experiences that build confidence and momentum toward the future students want.


MindEdge
 

MindEdge is a learning house with four different doors. Inside these doors, the rooms of our house are all constructed with the same high-quality materials, expertly designed, and learner-approved. MindEdge’s for-credit courses and student success products serve institutions of higher education. MindEdge's mission is to improve the way the world learns. Since our founding by Harvard and MIT educators in 1998, we have served some three million learners.
Professional development
Continuing education
